iam.description: Identity and Access Management for roles and policies used across the architecture (no direct service cost assumed).

cloudwatch.description: Monitoring and logging for ECS tasks, ALB, API Gateway and custom application logs.

kms.description: Customer Master Key(s) for encrypting S3 objects and other resources.

shield.description: AWS Shield (Standard) protection applied (no additional cost for standard).

fields.description: AWS Shield (Standard) protection applied (no additional cost for standard).

waf.description: Web Application Firewall protecting API Gateway / ALB with a set of rules.

vpc.description: Virtual Private Cloud with multi-AZ subnets and routing (no direct hourly charge).

api_gateway.description: Front-door API Gateway accepting API ingest traffic from clients.

s3.description: S3 bucket for batch ingest and input artifacts.
S3 bucket for NDJSON outputs and artifacts produced by verdict generation.

bedrock.description: Managed foundation models for dual LLM evaluation called by the verdict generation/policy evaluation flows.
